title: FileSystemAPI
content: "Please create a new version of the browser app that supports the ability to use FileSystemAPI on directories, this is essential for working with a BeatBuddy project and SD cards that are saved on my computer using the online editor."
creator: hggh3333

title: Firefox won't start with Profile #1, which has all my history, etc
content:
This problem just started with the latest version of Firefox that opens with two profiles. It worked for a short time and then failed. Firefox will not open if I choose the default profile. I can open Firefox if I choose Profile #2, but it has none of the history of the default profile. I lose all of my extensions, history, bookmarks - everything.

How can I get back to where I was yesterday? (Note: I'm just a user, not a computer geek, and don't understand the buzzwords or technospeak. I can follow clear instructions like copy, delete, rename, etc.)

I'm using an HP laptop with Windows 11.
creator: hofer51

title: Icons won't stay in tool bar
content: I am using version 147.0.1 (don't know when last update) For the last 1.5 hrs I have been trying to restore the extensions icons as well as other, to the tool bar. when I close "customize" after putting them there they disappear, as does the "puzzle" piece I put up there. What is going on? I have read numerous articles on how to fix this to no avail. Only one character will stay to the right of the added search bar.
creator: cowcorp

title: linux firefox apt install prioirty
content: When attempting install firefox on linux using the recommended install method (in order to use 1password fully i cannot install it via snap) the priority does not change from 500 to 1000 using the parameters described in the install guide. Here is an image showing my issue.
